languages.text: {n}Кассия стискивает нагрудник в области Атласа, и {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}кровь тонкими струйками стекает из ее горла, носа и глаз{/d}. Камень Фелека на ее шее разрывает тонкую кожу и падает под ноги Арлекина.{/n} "Что... это было? Как больно! Цвета смешались пред глазами..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия стискивает нагрудник в области Атласа, и кровь тонкими струйками стекает из ее горла, носа и глаз. Амулет Фелека на ее шее с треском раскалывается и падает под ноги Арлекина.{/n} "Что... это было? Как больно! Цвета смешались пред глазами..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate around where her Atlas is embedded and {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}thin rivulets of blood trickle from her mouth, nose, and eyes{/d}. Felek's stone on her neck tears through the skin and falls at the Harlequin's feet.{/n} "What... was that? The pain... The colours are swirling before my eyes..."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия стискивает нагрудник в области Атласа, и {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}кровь тонкими струйками стекает из ее горла, носа и глаз{/d}. Камень Фелека на ее шее разрывает тонкую кожу и падает под ноги Арлекина.{/n} "Что... это было? Как больно! Цвета смешались пред глазами..."

Felek's stone on her neck tears through the skin and falls at the Harlequin's feet.{/n} "What... was that? The pain... The colours are swirling before my eyes..."

languages.text: {n}カシアが胸当てのアトラスが埋め込まれたあたりをつかむと、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}その口から、鼻から、目から、ツゥ、と血をこぼす{/d}。カシアの首にあるフェレックの石が肌をずたずたに裂くと、ハーレクィンの足下に落ちる。{/n}「何が…起きたの？痛みが…あたくしの目の前で、色たちが渦巻いている…」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate around where her Atlas is embedded and {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}thin rivulets of blood trickle from her mouth, nose, and eyes{/d}. Felek's stone on her neck tears through the skin and falls at the Harlequin's feet.{/n} "What... was that? The pain... The colours are swirling before my eyes..."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアが胸当てのアトラスが埋め込まれたあたりをつかむと、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}その口から、鼻から、目から、ツゥ、と血をこぼす{/d}。カシアの首にあるフェレックの石が肌をずたずたに裂くと、ハーレクィンの足下に落ちる。{/n}「何が…起きたの？痛みが…あたくしの目の前で、色たちが渦巻いている…」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅紧紧抓着胸甲嵌着圣仪的地方，{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}鲜红的细流从她的嘴巴、鼻子与眼睛里流下来{/d}。费雷克石头撕开了她的皮肤，掉在了丑角脚下。{/n}“那是……什么？好痛啊……无数色彩在我眼前旋转……”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate around where her Atlas is embedded and {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}thin rivulets of blood trickle from her mouth, nose, and eyes{/d}. Felek's stone on her neck tears through the skin and falls at the Harlequin's feet.{/n} "What... was that? The pain... The colours are swirling before my eyes..."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅紧紧抓着胸甲嵌着圣仪的地方，细细的血流从她的嘴巴、鼻子与眼睛里流下来。费雷克石头撕开了她的皮肤，掉在了丑角脚下。{/n}“那是……什么？好痛啊……无数色彩在我眼前旋转……”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia se cramponne à sa cuirasse tandis que {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}du sang se met à ruisseler de sa bouche, son nez et ses yeux{/d}. La pierre de Felek s'extirpe alors de son cou et tombe aux pieds de l'Arlequin.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que... c'était ? La douleur... Les couleurs tourbillonnent devant mes yeux... »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate around where her Atlas is embedded and {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}thin rivulets of blood trickle from her mouth, nose, and eyes{/d}. Felek's stone on her neck tears through the skin and falls at the Harlequin's feet.{/n} "What... was that? The pain... The colours are swirling before my eyes..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia se cramponne à sa cuirasse tandis que du sang se met à ruisseler de sa bouche, son nez et ses yeux. La pierre de Felek s'extirpe alors de son cou et tombe aux pieds de l'arlequin.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que... c'était ? La douleur... Les couleurs tourbillonnent devant mes yeux... »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia aferra su coraza, donde se encuentra su Atlas, y unos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}delgados hilillos de sangre fluyen de sus ojos, su nariz y su boca{/d}. La piedra de Felek, en su cuello, atraviesa la piel de la mujer y cae a los pies del Arlequín.{/n} «¿Qué... ha sido eso? El dolor... Los colores se arremolinan ante mis ojos...».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate around where her Atlas is embedded and {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}thin rivulets of blood trickle from her mouth, nose, and eyes{/d}. Felek's stone on her neck tears through the skin and falls at the Harlequin's feet.{/n} "What... was that? The pain... The colours are swirling before my eyes..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia aferra su coraza, donde se encuentra su Atlas, y unos delgados hilillos de sangre fluyen de sus ojos, su nariz y su boca. La piedra de Felek, en su cuello, atraviesa la piel de la mujer y cae a los pies del Arlequín.{/n} «¿Qué... ha sido eso? El dolor... Los colores se arremolinan ante mis ojos...».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia greift sich an die Brustplatte, wo ihr Atlas eingesetzt ist, und {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}dünne Blutrinnsale fließen ihr aus Mund, Nase und Augen{/d}. Feleks Stein an ihrem Hals bricht durch ihre Haut und fällt dem Harlekin vor die Füße.{/n} "Was ... war das? Der Schmerz ... Die Farben verwischen vor meinen Augen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate around where her Atlas is embedded and {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}thin rivulets of blood trickle from her mouth, nose, and eyes{/d}. Felek's stone on her neck tears through the skin and falls at the Harlequin's feet.{/n} "What... was that? The pain... The colours are swirling before my eyes..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia greift sich an die Brustplatte, wo ihr Atlas eingesetzt ist, und dünne Blutrinnsale fließen ihr aus Mund, Nase und Augen. Feleks Stein an ihrem Hals bricht durch ihre Haut und fällt dem Harlekin vor die Füße.{/n} "Was ... war das? Der Schmerz ... Die Farben verwischen vor meinen Augen ..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia, göğüs zırhında Atlas'ın gömülü olduğu yerin etrafını sıkıca tutuyor. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}Ağzından, burnundan ve gözlerinden ince ince kan akıyor{/d}. Felek'in verdiği taş, Cassia'nın boynundan ayrılıp cildini yırtarak Arleken'in ayaklarının dibine düşüyor.{/n} "Ne... Ne oldu demin? Acı... Gözlerimin önünde renkler uçuşuyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate around where her Atlas is embedded and {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}thin rivulets of blood trickle from her mouth, nose, and eyes{/d}. Felek's stone on her neck tears through the skin and falls at the Harlequin's feet.{/n} "What... was that? The pain... The colours are swirling before my eyes..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia, göğüs zırhında Atlas'ın gömülü olduğu yerin etrafını sıkıca tutuyor. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}Ağzından, burnundan ve gözlerinden ince ince kan akıyor{/d}. Felek'in verdiği taş, Cassia'nın boynundan ayrılıp cildini yırtarak Arleken'in ayaklarının dibinde yere düşüyor.{/n} "Ne... Ne oldu demin? Acı... Gözlerimin önünde renkler uçuşuyor..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
